text: Mariya Mikhailovna Koroteyeva (; born 10 November 1981) is a Russian athlete who specializes in the 100 metres hurdles. Her personal best time is 12.60 seconds, achieved during the Olympic Games in Athens. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2000 |World Junior Championships |Santiago, Chile |8th (sf) |100m hurdles |13.47 (wind: -0.4 m/s) |- |2003 |European U23 Championships |Bydgoszcz, Poland |bgcolor="cc9966"|3rd |100m hurdles |12.95 (wind: 1.0 m/s) |- |rowspan=2|2004 |Olympic Games |Athens, Greece |4th |100m hurdles |12.72 |- |World Athletics Final |Monte Carlo, Monaco |8th |100m hurdles |12.79 |- |2005 |World Championships |Helsinki, Finland |5th |100m hurdles |12.93 |} ==External links== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Russian female hurdlers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Russia Category:People from Kashira
title: Mariya Koroteyeva
